pages.title: BABE Bay Area Birth Education – The Bay Area's Premiere Childbirth Education Resource

sections.h1: The Bay Area’s Premiere   Childbirth Education Resource
sections.content:
[Skip to content](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/#content)
Home[Aliki Cooper](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/author/aliki/ "Posts by Aliki Cooper")2023-10-24T05:54:39+00:00
### Birth is not just another day and this is not just ‘another’ Childbirth Class!
![Baby feet](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/foot-1.jpg)
![Baby feet](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/foot-2.jpg)
![Baby feet](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/foot-3.jpg)

Bay Area Birth Education from felicia roche on Vimeo
![video thumbnail](https://i.vimeocdn.com/video/1409457487-f63062003f48c85404471b8714de15b473c5fb79aac19c29a835222f6a6fb3a6-d?mw=80&q=85)

### We are very excited to now offer an online version of our premiere childbirth class!
[Register for the online course now](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/online/)
❝ We were so sad that we’d be missing Felica’s birth class in person this spring but little did we know what she had in store for us! The online BABE class is truly a treat: it’s beautifully produced, has a ton of engaging content (both videos and within the handout which is a birth knowledge treasure!), and on top of that you get all of Felicia’s incredible resources in one place. We felt cared for both by Felicia and by the effort she put into this course and would recommend it to any parents‑to‑be who want to be empowered by knowledge and finish the course with a sense of excitement and the ability to make their birth story their own. This course is for every parent who wants to feel well equipped and prepared for their birth journey.❞
– Cameron and Bing, May 2020

#### A FULL day of birth class?? ![Shock](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/shock_emoji.png)
#### This is a fun, informative and activity-filled day! ![Relief](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/relief_emoji.png)
Taught in our spacious, beautiful classroom near Fillmore and California Streets in the Fillmore district of San Francisco.

sections.title: Focused & relevant
sections.content: Out of respect for you and your time, the class stays focused on the most important information that is relevant and appropriate and moves steadily through all the topics.

sections.title: Up-to-date & evidence-based
sections.content: You will walk out of class with the most up-to-date, evidence-based information available on birth. We will sort out opinions and myths from facts.

sections.title: Positive & affirming
sections.content:
We have great respect and passion for birth. Our goal is to embrace and validate everyone’s unique priorities and situation. We strive to present all options in a positive affirming way.
Your level of participation in class is entirely up to you.
You will only be called upon if you want to volunteer.
There is time for connecting with your partner and occasionally with other couples.
The day flows with ease.
![](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/babe_childbirth_preparation.jpg)

sections.title: Childbirth Preparation
sections.content:
As a Doula for over 20 years, Felicia incorporates her experiences of assisting with thousands of births to provide expectant parents with options for natural coping techniques as well as options for optimizing medications and epidurals. She is a seasoned Lamaze Childbirth Educator who shares coping techniques, breathing strategies, positions for labor & birth, and partner support as part of your preparation for birth.
![](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/holding_feet.jpg)

sections.title: Healing after birth
sections.content:
Most expectant parents find their focus to be preparing for birth and a newborn.  This session will help you prepare for some of the realities of your postpartum recovery and how to get ready to have the best postpartum and breastfeeding experience.
![](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/babe_newborn_care.jpg)

sections.title: Newborn care and breastfeeding
sections.content:
We cover newborn hospital procedures, breastfeeding tips, facts, strategies and positioning. newborn care: diapering, swaddling, bonding, bathing. finishing with infant massage and newborn soothing.
![](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/babe_infant_cpr.jpg)

sections.title: Infant CPR
sections.content:
Build your confidence to handle an emergency at home!  Both CPR and choking response are covered in the safety portion of your one day class. Each “couple” will have hands-on practice with an infant CPR mannequin provided by BABE. You will be trained by an experienced and certified CPR instructor with the sole focus of infant CPR.
### See what the doctors have to say about BABE
> “For years it has been my pleasure to refer my patients to the BABE class taught by Felicia and team. It has been reported many times that the class was fun, respectful and it’s easy to see how prepared they are with questions and ideas of what they want their birth to be.”
![Doctor](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/doctor.png)**John Fassett, MS CNM**
> “Felicia (and team) provides very comprehensive birth & postpartum classes that are very informative and interactive for both the mother and partner, providing vital pre-delivery and postpartum information that is not in a large group or a boring lecture style. I would highly recommend Felicia for her doula services and prenatal classes!”
![Doctor](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/doctor.png)**Izumi Cabrera, MD/OB GYN**
[Page load link](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/#)
[![](https://feliciaroche.com/wp-content/uploads/Logo_Wellness_Magazine.png)](https://wellnessmasterclub.ewellnessmag.com/birthing-brilliance-how-felicia-roche-and-bay-area-birth-education-are-changing-the-narrative-for-modern-families-ffs-a-699-2025-bay-area-birth-education/)

pages.title: About BABE – BABE Bay Area Birth Education

sections.content:
[Skip to content](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/about/#content)
About BABE[Aliki Cooper](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/author/aliki/ "Posts by Aliki Cooper")2024-11-27T05:28:06+00:00
BABE was founded by Felicia Roche, a veteran doula, doula trainer and Lamaze Certified Childbirth Educator with decades of experience in birth and education. Felicia works with a team of highly experienced assistant educators, doulas and assistants during BABE classes.
[![Felicia Roche](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/felicia_roche-1.jpg)](http://feliciaroche.com/)
### [Felicia Roche](http://feliciaroche.com/)
##### DONA Certified Doula
##### DONA Approved Doula Trainer
##### Lamaze Certified Childbirth Educator
![Lamaze Certified Childbirth Educator](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/LCCE_purple.png)
Felicia is a Certified Doula through [DONA](http://www.dona.org/) International since 1998. She has been offering DONA Approved Birth Doula Trainings since 2002 and has trained hundreds of women in this time – women travel from all over the world to take her trainings. She served as the DONA Northern California Representative for 7 years.
In June 2006 she became certified with Lamaze International as a Childbirth Educator (LCCE)
Felicia has assisted over 1000 families during their labors and births in the Bay Area and continues to make a difference for women and families on nearly a weekly basis. She has successfully built strong professional alliances with many care providers and nurses at local hospitals. She is very involved in many aspects of building a doula community locally and nationally.
In 2004, the [Learning Annex](http://www.learningannex.com/) in San Francisco contracted Felicia to teach a course titled “How to Start a Career as a Birth Doula.” The course was so successful that in the spring of 2005 Felicia presented the same topic for the Learning Annex in Sacramento.
She previously served as the executive director and publications coordinator for [Birthways](http://www.birthways.org/), a non-profit childbirth and pregnancy resources and referral center in the Bay Area.
Before finding her calling as a doula Felicia served for many years as a rape crisis counselor, joining women in trauma and guiding them through a heightened and volatile process. She was also a sex educator and lifeskills coach for Planned Parenthood, working with inner-city school kids
![Gillian Gillette](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/kim.jpg)
### Kim Knapp
Hi! I’m Kim, I’m a birth doula and childbirth educator.
I was trained through DONA and had the privilege to be part of the UCSF doula program where I participated in countless unique birth settings. I am a lifelong learner, and I am both honored and grateful to have worked alongside many other amazing birth workers throughout my career. We are each passionate about supporting and advocating for birthing families.
As a young birthing person, I personally experienced a traumatic birthing event. Buckled with my own lack of knowledge, my inexperience, the lack of care from the medical staff and my inability to speak up, I was left with years of post-traumatic distress.  It was then I knew I would somehow find my way to birthwork and supporting families to have positive birth experiences.
Let’s demystify the birth process together.  When you know what to expect, you can plan for how you will approach the difficult parts and celebrate your milestone wins! Knowledge is power.  Educating and empowering yourself to have agency over your decisions transforms fear into confidence.  Confidence makes you unstoppable!
When I am not teaching, coaching, or supporting birth families, I love movies, traveling and making memories with my family.
Looking forward to meeting you!
[Page load link](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/about/#)
[![](https://feliciaroche.com/wp-content/uploads/Logo_Wellness_Magazine.png)](https://wellnessmasterclub.ewellnessmag.com/birthing-brilliance-how-felicia-roche-and-bay-area-birth-education-are-changing-the-narrative-for-modern-families-ffs-a-699-2025-bay-area-birth-education/)

$225.00
You will need to create a login at checkout if you do not already have one in order to be able to access the course  materials. The course will be available to you for **90 days after the time of registration**.
Bay Area Birth Education Online Childbirth Class is a comprehensive online childbirth class which is relevant, dynamic and thorough covering: Childbirth Preparation, Stages of Labor including comfort measures and medical treatments as well as some guides to postpartum realities and breastfeeding.
Should you be looking for more support, Felicia Roche offers a birth coaching package which include this course and two hours of birth coaching where she can personally help you work through what is possible for your birth.
[Find out about Birth Coaching Package](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/product/babe-online-childbirth-class-birth-coaching-package/)
Otherwise, please click Add to Cart to purchase this online class without the birth coaching.

### Description
Bay Area Birth Education Online Childbirth Class is a comprehensive online childbirth class which is relevant, dynamic and thorough covering: Childbirth Preparation, Stages of Labor including comfort measures and medical treatments as well as some guides to pospartum realities and breastfeeding.
See what doctors are saying about BABE’s Childbirth Class and its value to their patients:
“For years it has been my pleasure to refer my patients to the BABE class taught by Felicia and team. It has been reported many times that the class was fun, respectful and it’s easy to see how prepared they are with questions and ideas of what they want their birth to be.”
-John Fassett, MS CNM
“Felicia (and team) provides very comprehensive birth & postpartum classes that are very informative and interactive for both the mother and partner, providing vital pre-delivery and postpartum information that is not in a large group or a boring lecture style. I would highly recommend Felicia for her doula services and prenatal classes!
– Izumi Cabrera, MD/OB GYN

sections.h1: BABE Online Childbirth Class with Birth Coaching Package
sections.content:

[![Stages of Labor](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/stages_of_labor_2_online-600x600.jpg)](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/stages_of_labor_2_online.jpg)[Stages of Labor](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/stages_of_labor_2_online.jpg "Stages of Labor")
[![Optimal Fetal Positioning](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/optimal_fetal_positioning-600x600.jpg)](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/optimal_fetal_positioning.jpg)[Optimal Fetal Positioning](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/optimal_fetal_positioning.jpg "Optimal Fetal Positioning")
[![Postpartum](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/postpartum_online-600x600.jpg)](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/postpartum_online.jpg)[Postpartum](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/postpartum_online.jpg "Postpartum")
[![BABE Online Childbirth Class](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/Babe_Online_Childbirth_Class-600x600.jpg)](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/Babe_Online_Childbirth_Class.jpg)[BABE Online Childbirth Class](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/Babe_Online_Childbirth_Class.jpg "BABE Online Childbirth Class")
1. ![BABE Online Childbirth Class](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/Babe_Online_Childbirth_Class-100x100.jpg)
2. ![Felicia Roche, Instructor](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/felicia_roche_online-100x100.jpg)
3. ![What are centimeters?](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/what_are_centimeters_online-100x100.jpg)
4. ![Stages of Labor](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/stages_of_labor_online-100x100.jpg)
5. ![Stages of Labor](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/stages_of_labor_2_online-100x100.jpg)
6. ![Optimal Fetal Positioning](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/optimal_fetal_positioning-100x100.jpg)
7. ![Postpartum](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/postpartum_online-100x100.jpg)
$435.00
You will need to create a login at checkout if you do not already have one in order to be able to access the course materials. The course will be available to you for **90 days after the time of registration**.
Bay Area Birth Education Online Childbirth Class is a comprehensive online childbirth class which is relevant, dynamic and thorough covering: Childbirth Preparation, Stages of Labor including comfort measures and medical treatments as well as some guides to postpartum realities and breastfeeding.
This birth coaching package includes this course and two hours of birth coaching where Felicia can personally help you work through what is possible for your birth.  See the Description below for more details about the birth coaching.
BABE Online Childbirth Class with Birth Coaching Package quantity
Add to cart
Category: [Online Course](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/product-category/online-course/)
- [Description](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/product/babe-online-childbirth-class-birth-coaching-package/#tab-description)
- [Reviews (0)](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/product/babe-online-childbirth-class-birth-coaching-package/#tab-reviews)
### Description
Your package includes:
- Access to the [online BABE Childbirth Preparation class](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/) (a $250 value) for up to 3 weeks past your due date.
- Two one hour Birth Coaching Zoom meetings at your convenience where we discuss and prepare you for:
  - Hospital policies and culture
  - Ways to prepare yourself for safe time at home in the absence of frequent prenatal doctor visits
  - Laboring at home as long as possible (if that’s what you prefer)
  - Tips for getting to the hospital safely
  - Packing for hospital
  - Creating an effective birth plan (I will edit it for you)
  - Comfort measures / Breathing coaching
  - Effective communication strategies with hospital staff
  - Creating a calm environment in your labor room
  - Work through the fears, anxieties or questions you want to discuss or work through
  - Ongoing communication as you prepare for birth
Even though we don’t know how your labor will unfold … You’ve got this!
### Reviews
There are no reviews yet.

pages.title: In-person Class – BABE Bay Area Birth Education

sections.h1: Let the fun and confident learning begin!
sections.content:
[Skip to content](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/class/#content) In-person Class[Aliki Cooper](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/author/aliki/ "Posts by Aliki Cooper")2025-09-02T20:44:56+00:00 You are welcome to take the class at any time during your pregnancy. Please register for the class of your choice as soon as you can. Classes fill up quickly. (BABE is happy to now offer [an ONLINE version of our childbirth class](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/product/babe-online-childbirth-class/) as well.) Bay Area Birth Education from felicia roche on Vimeo ![video thumbnail](https://i.vimeocdn.com/video/1409457487-f63062003f48c85404471b8714de15b473c5fb79aac19c29a835222f6a6fb3a6-d?mw=80&q=85) Playing in picture-in-picture More options Like Play 00:00 01:31 SettingsPicture-in-PictureFullscreen [Watch on Vimeo](https://vimeo.com/?fl=pl&fe=vl) QualityAuto SpeedNormal #### Class Times 9am – 5:15pm Fillmore District of SF Childbirth Class $475.00\* ( [Infant CPR portion only](http://events.eventzilla.net/e/infant-cpr-class-2138903184) $50 per person) \\* This price is for the purchase of **1 ticket** which entitles entry for **up to 2 people**: mother and a partner/companion Upon registration you will immediately receive an email with all of the finer details of the class, i.e. address, parking, break times, etc. We highly recommend purchasing a copy of [The Birth Partner 5th Edition](https://www.amazon.com/dp/1558329102/?coliid=I2K6XD2ARAPCCZ&colid=2S90BBKJB02DM&psc=1&ref_=lv_vv_lig_dp_it) – this book is the foundation of our class. Although it isn’t necessary, it is a wonderful supplementation to your in person education **Cancellation**: If you have to cancel the same week as the class you cannot get a full refund you will have access to the online class and can still get the Birth coaching package. #### Class Dates | | | --- | | 2025 | | October 4
December 6 | | | | --- | | 2026 | | February 7
April 11
June 6
August 1
October 10
December 5 | Remember that we do also offer [an online course](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/product/babe-online-childbirth-class/) which you can take anytime. [Register](https://www.eventzilla.net/o/babe) - #### After the class you will know: - How to know if this is it!  Timing contractions and signs of labor - Relaxation and coping strategies – Positions, Breathing, Massage - Understanding of medical treatments – When and how they can be beneficial and possible side effects - Pain medications for labor and birth – shared in a respectful, objective way - The role of the doula - The role of the partner/companion – how they can help and how they need help, too - Breastfeeding tips - Newborn care including bath and infant massage - Soothing your newborn - Maximizing your recovery after birth - Infant CPR basics – this is not a certification \* - An engaging and memorable experience! - Interested in only the one hour Infant CPR portion of the class? [Register](https://events.eventzilla.net/e/infant-cpr-class-2138903184 "Register for Infant CPR Class Only") “All we knew about birth before taking the Babe class was what we had seen in movies. And they skip out on a lot of parts, but the Babe class filled us in on all those parts! The way Felicia and her team educate about labor, delivery and the first few weeks postpartum helped build our confidence. There are lots of little bits of wisdom with catchy phrases that we started calling Felicia-isms. They were easy to remember even when our brains were elsewhere and we were severely sleep deprived, but they helped keep us calm and confident that we could do this! Highly recommend the Babe class to anyone who is preparing to give birth and there’s so much great content to educate partners on how to be supportive.” ### What you will get from your BABE class - How to know if this is it!  Timing contractions and signs of labor - Signs of labor and timing contractions - Relaxation and coping strategies – Positions, Breathing, Massage - Understanding of medical treatments – When and how they can be beneficial and possible side effects - Pain medications for labor and birth – shared in a respectful, objective way - The role of the doula - The role of the partner/dad/co-parent – How they can help and how they need help, too - Breastfeeding tips - Soothing your newborn - Maximizing your recovery after birth - Infant CPR basics - An engaging and memorable experience!

### 2017
April 8
May 6
June 3
July 8
August 5
[Register Now](http://www.eventzilla.net/user/babe)
### What you will get from your BABE class
- How to know if this is it!  Timing contractions and signs of labor
- Signs of labor and timing contractions
- Relaxation and coping strategies – Positions, Breathing, Massage
- Understanding of medical treatments – When and how they can be beneficial and possible side effects
- Pain medications for labor and birth – shared in a respectful, objective way
- The role of the doula
- The role of the partner/dad/co-parent – How they can help and how they need help, too
- Breastfeeding tips
- Soothing your newborn
- Maximizing your recovery after birth
- Infant CPR basics
- An engaging and memorable experience!
### Location
Taught in our spacious, beautiful classroom near Fillmore and California Streets in the Fillmore District of San Francisco.
### When Should I Sign Up?
You are welcome to take the class at any time during your pregnancy. Please register for the class of your choice as soon as you can. Classes fill up quickly.

Now that you have registered[Aliki Cooper](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/author/aliki/ "Posts by Aliki Cooper")2020-04-27T05:33:39+00:00

![](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/baby_feet.png)

#### Thank you for registering for BABE’s Childbirth Class!

**NOW THAT YOU HAVE REGISTERED:**

We strongly recommended that you read all of the following!

**TO BRING:**

Notebook/pen

Casual layered clothing

At least 2 pillows to cushion your chairs

Snacks/ready-to-eat lunch

Travel mug with lid

Hand-held fan for those who “run hot”

Prepare as you would for birth! The night before, rest and relax so that you are able to come to the class refreshed and ready. A tremendous amount material will be presented. Please bring a pen and paper. This is a full, fun, interactive day. Bring your good attitude and a willingness to participate in the MANY activities and interactive learning mo

Bay Area Birth Education offers a comprehensive online childbirth class which is relevant, dynamic and thorough covering: Childbirth Preparation, Stages of Labor including comfort measures and medical treatments as well as some guides to pospartum realities and breastfeeding and newborn care resources. **This course is available to you for 90 days after time of registration.**
Felicia Roche offers a birth coaching package, should you be looking for more support, which includes the online course and two hours of birth coaching where she can personally help you work through what is possible for your birth.
#### “In midst of childbirth, you were a source of strength and knowledge that came in the form of a friend”
-L.M. 11/22/20
### Live In-Person Childbirth Class
$475
- Custom Class Manual
- Comprehensive in-person childbirth class that is relevant, dynamic and thorough covering: Childbirth Perparation, Infant CPR, Breastfeeding and Newborn Care
- \*\*Bonus\*\* access to online class at no extra charge
[Learn more and register](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/class)
### BABE Online Childbirth Class
$225
- Online Education Modules
- Learn at your own pace
- Downloadable Resources
- 3 months (90 days) access to online class
[Learn more and register](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/product/babe-online-childbirth-class/)
### Birth Coaching Package Deal
$+215
- Add Birth Coaching sessions to BABE in-person or online classes for an added $215
- Two 1-hour Birth Coaching Zoom meetings
- Extra Induction Prep discussion if needed
- \*\*BONUS\*\* One Comfort Measures zoom meeting.
- \\* For in-person class, you will see Birth Coaching sessions add-on at checkout
[In-Person class with Birth Coaching Sessions add-on](https://www.eventzilla.net/user/babe)
[Online class with Birth Coaching Sessions](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/product/babe-online-childbirth-class-birth-coaching-package/)

Now that you have registered for Infant CPR[Aliki Cooper](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/author/aliki/ "Posts by Aliki Cooper")2019-07-17T13:46:09+00:00

![](https://bayareabirtheducation.com/wp-content/uploads/baby_feet.png)

#### Thank you for registering for BABE’s Infant CPR Class!

**NOW THAT YOU HAVE REGISTERED:**

Please note that this class starts **PROMPTLY at 1:10pm** and will end at 2:10pm, so please plan to arrive by 1:00 so that you can get settled in time for the start.

**ADDRESS:**

Congregation Sherith Israel Temple House (directly to the right of the Temple)

2266 California Street

San Francisco, CA 94115

(the class is non-denominational)

**PARKING:**

There is a CPMC Hospital parking lot located at Clay and Webster 2340 Clay St. (just a few blocks from the venue). It is a CPMC parking lot with lots of parking spaces on the weekend. There is limited and unl
